headers.Content-Security-Policy: default-src 'self'; script-src 'self' 'unsafe-inline' https://fonts.googleapis.com https://fonts.gstatic.com; style-src 'self' 'unsafe-inline' https://fonts.googleapis.com; font-src 'self' https://fonts.gstatic.com; img-src 'self' data:; connect-src 'self'; frame-ancestors 'none';
headers.Permissions-Policy: camera=(), microphone=(), geolocation=(), payment=(), usb=(), magnetometer=(), gyroscope=(), accelerometer=(), ambient-light-sensor=(), autoplay=(), encrypted-media=(), fullscreen=(), picture-in-picture=(), speaker=(), sync-xhr=(), midi=(), clipboard-read=(), clipboard-write=(), web-share=(), xr-spatial-tracking=()

headers.value: default-src 'self'; script-src 'self' 'unsafe-inline' https://fonts.googleapis.com https://fonts.gstatic.com; style-src 'self' 'unsafe-inline' https://fonts.googleapis.com; font-src 'self' https://fonts.gstatic.com; img-src 'self' data:; connect-src 'self'; frame-ancestors 'none';
